tasks.name: Programmer's Nature Problem
tasks.description: Why don't programmers like nature? Because it has too many bugs and no stack traces!
tasks.summary: Test task completed successfully. This was a joke task created to test the task management system functionality. The task description itself was a programmer joke about nature having bugs with no stack traces. No actual implementation was required - this was purely for testing task creation, execution, and verification workflows.

tasks.name: 1.1 Create Export Models and Enums
tasks.description: Define core export types including ExportFormat enum, ExportOptions record, and ExportResult record
tasks.analysisResult: Export Feature Implementation: Comprehensive task list for implementing export functionality for Dependabot alerts and Checkmarx scan results using the Strategy Pattern for runtime format selection. Priority is PlainText format (LLM-optimized) first, then JSON and CSV. Estimated Total Effort: 6-10 hours.
tasks.verificationCriteria: Models compile, records are immutable, all three files exist in src/CheckmarxTool.Web/Models/Export/

tasks.name: 2.1 Extend ScanResult Model
tasks.description: Add CWE and description properties to ScanResult for enriched export data
tasks.analysisResult: Export Feature Implementation: Comprehensive task list for implementing export functionality for Dependabot alerts and Checkmarx scan results using the Strategy Pattern for runtime format selection. Priority is PlainText format (LLM-optimized) first, then JSON and CSV. Estimated Total Effort: 6-10 hours.
tasks.implementationGuide:
Add nullable properties to ScanResult:
- Cwe (int?) - CWE identifier
- CweDescription (string?) - CWE explanation
- VulnerabilityDescription (string?) - Query description
- Language (string?) - Programming language
- QueryGroup (string?) - Query category group
- Categories (IReadOnlyList<string>?) - OWASP/SANS categories
tasks.verificationCriteria: Model compiles, properties are nullable, existing functionality not broken

tasks.name: 2.2 Add GetQueriesForScanExtended to CxClientAdapter
tasks.description: Wrapper method to call Checkmarx.API GetQueriesForScan for enrichment data
tasks.analysisResult: Export Feature Implementation: Comprehensive task list for implementing export functionality for Dependabot alerts and Checkmarx scan results using the Strategy Pattern for runtime format selection. Priority is PlainText format (LLM-optimized) first, then JSON and CSV. Estimated Total Effort: 6-10 hours.
tasks.implementationGuide:
Add method to interface and implementation:
Task<IEnumerable<CxQuery>> GetQueriesForScanAsync(long scanId)
Use _client.Scans.GetQueriesForScan(scanId) internally
tasks.verificationCriteria: Method returns query data including CweId

tasks.name: 2.3 Update ScanResultsRetriever to Populate Enriched Fields
tasks.description: Modify BuildScanFinding to populate CWE and description fields from query data
tasks.analysisResult: Export Feature Implementation: Comprehensive task list for implementing export functionality for Dependabot alerts and Checkmarx scan results using the Strategy Pattern for runtime format selection. Priority is PlainText format (LLM-optimized) first, then JSON and CSV. Estimated Total Effort: 6-10 hours.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Call GetQueriesForScanAsync once per scan
2. Build dictionary keyed by QueryId for O(1) lookup
3. In BuildScanFinding, lookup query and populate:
   - Cwe = query.CweId
   - VulnerabilityDescription = query.Description
   - Language = query.Language
   - QueryGroup = query.Group
tasks.verificationCriteria: ScanResults contain CWE data when retrieved

tasks.name: 3.1 DependabotPlainTextExportStrategy
tasks.description: PlainText export for Dependabot alerts (LLM-optimized format)
tasks.analysisResult: Export Feature Implementation: Comprehensive task list for implementing export functionality for Dependabot alerts and Checkmarx scan results using the Strategy Pattern for runtime format selection. Priority is PlainText format (LLM-optimized) first, then JSON and CSV. Estimated Total Effort: 6-10 hours.
tasks.implementationGuide:
Create strategy implementing IExportStrategy<DependabotAlert>:
- Format as human-readable sections per alert
- Include: Package, Severity, Advisory, Ecosystem, Vulnerable Versions, Fixed Version
- Use clear headers and separators for LLM consumption
tasks.verificationCriteria: Output is human-readable, suitable for LLM consumption

Create strategy implementing IExportStrategy<DependabotAlert>:

- Include all alert properties

tasks.name: 4.3 Integrate Export into DependabotProjectResults Page
